fn.p: Luis M. Carrascal conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Sara Villén-Pérez conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
David Palomino contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, prepared figures and/or tables, organized, designed, analyzed and developed the Winter Spanish Bird Atlas.
